column4: how do I make firefox accept text input? I can't type into any text boxes (address bar, google box, search pages on sites, etc)
very strange. is it only Firefox? Have you restarted Firefox? Have you restarted Ubuntu? Is it intermittent or all the time? Did you recently change anything that might have made it go wrong?
worked earlier. no longer works. I've not restarted anything yet
restarting firefox worked, but that's not awesome
